feature.priority: {% if tags.railway == 'station' %}0{% elseif tags.railway in [ 'halt', 'tram_stop' ] %}1{% else %}5{% endif %}
feature.title: {% if tags.ref %}{{ localizedTag(tags, 'ref') }} - {% endif %}{{ localizedTag(tags, 'name')|default(localizedTag(tags, 'operator'))|default(trans('unnamed')) }}
